subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: NOTICE TO ALL : Enough already!
author: David Koenig
full_text:
The same group attacked the Magic Cafe.They were all booted out!

On Tue, Aug 18, 2009 at 2:43 PM, Lisa <lawlis1969@...> wrote:

>
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com <EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>, "Misty"
> <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
> >
> > I am getting pretty tired of a few whos sole purpose in this group is to
> provoke Frank and other members into negativity. If it continues you and
> your fake nicknames will be removed. Your attempts to promote your "other
> group" will be viewed as spam and deleted as such. They may go unnoticed by
> the group but they dont go unnoticed by me. Funny how its always just that
> one person/group that you promote while every post you make is not about
> your research or anyone elses but rather a play on words meant to provoke
> someone. You should run a quick background check on your friend the owner of
> that "other group" you may find you know less than you thought you did. You
> know who you are. And so do I.
> >
> > As for Frank, he knows I dont always agree with what he says. He knows I
> definitely dont agree with the namecalling or public venting. Having said
> that. Frank is the founder of this group. As such he will ALWAYS have a
> voice here. Those who dont like that or dont agree are free to move on.
> >
> > If you are here to learn about EVP-ITC, Frank's Box, or share your
> research, by all means do so. If you are here for another purpose then dont
> be surprised when you go to sign in and find you are no longer a member
> here.
> >
> > Misty
> >
>
> Hi Misty,
>
> I joined this group a long time ago...pretty much a silent observer. I
> don't even read all of the emails I get on updates. I thought when I saw the
> whole name calling thing it was some sensitive person whining about a spirit
> saying colorful things to them...then I read a few. ARE THEY SERIOUS. Please
> know there are many people who agree with you and Frank and agree whole
> heartedly you should delete the faint of heart...LOL. Can you imagine how
> they would react to a simple BOO from a voice from beyond? LOL...what fools.
>
>  
>
